title: Apple, cherry and marzipan pie
description: Put some tart into your pie with dried sour cherries. The combination of apples, dried cherries and cubes of sweet marzipan is irresistible.Equipment and preparation: you will need a 23cm/9in ceramic pie dish.
ingredients: 430g/15oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
3 Braeburn apples, peeled, cored and cut into 1cm/½in thick slices
3 Cox apples, peeled, cored and cut into 1cm/½in thick slices
1 free-range egg, lightly beaten with a pinch of salt
